item.description: Incan empire and the Egyptian Rhind Papyrus and here’s the 1615 notes of Felipe Guaman on the Incan empire Here’s a link to the Rhind Papyrus full image on the British Museum website. Representing arithmetic and fractions This is a link to Florian Cajori’s History of Mathematical Notations, volume 2. Specifically, it points to the history of the dollar sign, $, because that might be an interesting entry point into the book.
